column26: Illumina Genome Analyzer IIx sequencing; RNAseq of triple arabidopsis mutant ddc at 25Mm Cd
column27: RNAseq of arabidopsis plants at different cadmium concentrations
column28: Illumina Genome Analyzer IIx sequencing; RNAseq of triple arabidopsis mutant ddc at 25Mm Cd
column29: Plants of Arabidopsis thaliana (L.) Heynh drm1 drm2 cmt3.11 (ddc) DNA methylation mutant in Columbia-0 (Col-0) background, which combines drm1 (SALK_021316; AT5G15380) with T-DNA insertion in the sixth exon, drm2 (SALK_150863; AT5G14620) with T-DNA insertion in the last exon, and cmt3.11 (SALK_148381; AT1G69770) with T-DNA insertion in the eighth intron. Seeds were purchased from the Nottingham Arabidopsis Stock Centre (NASC, http://Arabidopsis.info/). The plants were grown in half-strength MS medium 1% sucrose supplemented with 25 M Cd by directly adding an aliquot of CdCl2 water stock solution (100 mM) to medium immediately before placing it in the Petri dishes. Samples were exposed at 21C under long day condition with white light (neon fluorescent tubes Radium NL Spectralux, cool white, 100 mol m-2 s-1) and 50% relative humidity until 21 days after germination (DAG)
